授業方法: IMPORTANT NOTICE: This course will be offered in an on-demand format. This course is conducted in lecture format. Please note the following in light of the ongoing pandemic: assignments will be posted on LUNA throughout the term, along with important announcements about the course -- including which lectures are in person and which are online -- and so it is critical that students log in to LUNA regularly during this course.

第1回:
Introduction: Course Overview, Key Concepts
No Assignment Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on Sept. 30 at 5:00 PM on LUNA.
第2回:
Rome’s Shadow: The Legacy of Ancient Rome in Europe Part I
No Assignment Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on Oct. 7 at 5:00 PM on LUNA.
第3回:
Rome’s Shadow: The Legacy of Ancient Rome in Europe Part II
No Assignment Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Oct. 14 at 5:00 PM.
第4回:
Westphalia: The Development of the Nation-State
Written Response #1 Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Oct. 21 at 5:00 PM.
第5回:
The Rise of Empires: European Colonialism and Territorial Expansion
Written Response #2 Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Oct. 28 at 5:00 PM.
第6回:
The Napoleonic Wars: The Rise of France and Balance of Power
Written Response #3 Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Nov. 4 at 5:00 PM.
第7回:
Pax Britannica: British Hegemony in the 19th Century
Written Response #4 Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Nov. 11 at 5:00 PM.
第8回:
World War I: The Transformation of European Relations Part I
Written Response #5 Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Nov. 18 at 5:00 PM.
第9回:
World War I: The Transformation of European Relations Part II
Written Response #6 Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Nov. 25 at 5:00 PM.
第10回:
The Twenty Years’ Crisis: The Road to the Second World War
Written Response #7 Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Dec. 2 at 5:00 PM.
第11回:
World War II: The Decline of European Power
Written Response #8 Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Dec. 9 at 5:00 PM.
第12回:
Research and Writing Strategies for the Final Paper
No Assignment Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Dec. 16 at 5:00 PM.
第13回:
The Cold War: Europe in the Shadow of America and Russia
No Assignment Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Dec. 23 at 5:00 PM.
第14回:
The Future of Europe: The EU, Britain, and a Changing Geopolitical Landscape
Final Research Paper Due
URL for this video lecture will be posted on LUNA on Jan. 6 at 5:00 PM.

評価.教科書Required texts0: All reading assignments will be based on texts available at the SIS library.
評価.参考文献・資料Reference books0:
Note: Full bibliographical information for the following reading materials will be included in the full-length syllabus given to students on the first day of class.

Mary Beard, “SPQR: A History of Rome”
Holger H. Herwig, “The Marne, 1914: The Opening of World War I and the Battle that Changed the World”
Buddy Levy, “Conquistador: Hernan Cortes, King Montezuma, and the Last Stand of the Aztecs”
Rebecca Berens Matzke, “Deterrence through Strength: British Naval Power and Foreign Policy under Pax Britannica”
Munro Price, “Napoleon: The End of Glory”
Victor Rothwell, “The Origins of the Second World War”
Peter H. Wilson, “Europe’s Tragedy: A New History of the Thirty Years War”
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Guidelines for the final paper will be provided on Luna during the term
成績評価Grading2: Weekly short assignments based on the on-demand lectures

name: 【320】International Relations in Europe　２／International Relations in Europe
担当者: デソーテ　フランソワ（DE SOETE FRANCOIS）
